item.title: Tidying workflows in R
item.description: Recently, I started to seriously1 think about the tidiness of data analysis project folders, and the implications of tidying up. I was lucky enough to talk about what I have figured out so far at the Genève R User Group. While I am not done yet with reflecting on this2, I wanted to write down my thoughts that lead to my presentation3. So what follows is just “thinking out loud”.
